short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that displays which company owns the current website you're on.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension that displays which companies own the websites you visit.

Open Source. Community driven.

* Very low footprint on resources
* Does not collect information
